nodes.text: Zone N7 was one of the areas that made up the northern hemisphere of the first Death Star. It contained several sprawls, including one referred to as City Sprawl North 7: A68. Although North 7:A68 was technically an independent "village" from Zone N7, its communications and sensor networks were nonetheless interconnected with Zone N7, which in turn directly reported the information to the Overbridge. It was destroyed along with the rest of the Death Star during the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY.
